hero.title: Hubbardly
hero.subtitle: From Pantry to Plate: Discover, Cook, Enjoy!

mainFeatures.title: Free
mainFeatures.tagline: Find recipes using up to three ingredients.
mainFeatures.content: Keep your pantry inventory updated and connect with a community of home cooks. Input your ingredients and find delicious recipes using up to three of your pantry items. Share your own recipes and discover new ones, all for free!

mainFeatures.title: Zero Config
mainFeatures.content: With PocketHost, batteries are included. You get a database, outgoing email, SSL, authentication, cloud functions, and high concurrency all in one stop.

subFeatures.title: Database
subFeatures.content: Your PocketHost instance is powered by its own internal SQLite instance. SQLite is more performant than mySQL or Postgres and is perfect for powering your next app.
